channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [STORM-3549] use of topology specific jaas conf doesn't work with kafka
item.description:
2019-09-17 19:22:23.006 o.a.s.u.Utils Thread-22-line-reader-spout-executor[4, 4] [ERROR] Async loop died!

item.summary: use of topology specific jaas conf doesn't work with kafka

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
For your information, all STORM issues have been transferred to Github: https://github.com/apache/storm/issues/

Here is the direct link to this issue in Github: https://github.com/apache/storm/issues//7331
And here is the link to a search for related issues: https://github.com/apache/storm/issues/?q=%22STORM-3549%22

(Note: this is an automated bulk comment)
